sentences.en: Finally, we show some basic J2EE bookkeeping.
sentences.cn: 最后，我们将展示一些基本的J2EE记帐。

sentences.en: Mary Ann, his wife, passed by with her bookkeeping binder.
sentences.cn: 他的妻子玛丽安捧着出纳簿从边上走过。

sentences.en: This approach leads to fixed bookkeeping overhead per chunk.
sentences.cn: 这种方法导致每个块都有固定的薄记开销。
